name: habitica
tagline: A gamified task manager that turns habits and goals into role playing challenges
description: Habitica is a gamified task manager based on role-playing game mechanics. Users complete real-life tasks to level up, earn rewards, and battle monsters. It supports both self-hosted setup and hosted service tiers.

features.title: Habit Tracking
features.description: Records daily habits and recurring behaviors and tracks whether they are completed or missed

features.title: Task and Todo Management
features.description: Manages one-time tasks daily tasks and long-term goals in a single system

features.title: Progress Visualization
features.description: Reflects task completion and habit consistency through visible progress indicators

features.title: Gamified Feedback
features.description: Represents productivity progress using game-style mechanics tied to task outcomes

features.title: User Accounts
features.description: Stores task data and progress separately for each user

features.title: Social Groups
features.description: Allows users to participate in shared groups and challenges

features.title: API Access
features.description: Enables integration with external applications and automation tools

features.title: Self-Hosted Server
features.description: Run the Habitica server on your own infrastructure
